scripts.test: TS_NODE_PROJECT='./src/test/tsconfig.commonjs.json' TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --require ts-node/register --require mock-local-storage --require jsdom-global/register --allow-uncaught --colors --reporter mocha-reporter --timeout 5000 src/test/*.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:dom
scripts.build-prod:js: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod ./node_modules/.bin/parcel build src/index.ts -d dist --out-file cruxpay-sdk.js --no-minify
scripts.build-prod:dom: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod ./node_modules/.bin/parcel build src/cruxpay-sdk-dom.ts -d dist --out-file cruxpay-sdk-dom.js --no-minify --no-cache --detailed-report
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod:js && npm run build-prod:dom
scripts.checks: tslint 'src/**/*.ts' && npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.version-bump: ((./node_modules/.bin/git-branch-is release/dev || ./node_modules/.bin/git-branch-is master) && npm version patch) || true
scripts.publish:dev: npm run build && npm run transpile && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev gulp config && npm publish --registry http://138.197.216.253:4873
scripts.publish:prod: npm run build-prod && npm run transpile && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod gulp config && npm publish --access public
